languages.text: {n}Джай бросает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Что бы с ним ни сделали, шерин, назад ему путь заказан... моя бы воля — позволила бы ему соскользнуть в ту реальность, где еще есть надежда найти Тацита. Пускай уйдет в мире с собой, а не как предатель".

traits.locale_text: {n}Джай бросает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Что бы с ним не сделали, шерин, назад ему путь заказан... моя бы воля — позволила бы ему соскользнуть в ту реальность, где еще есть надежда найти Тацита. Пускай уйдет в мире с собой, а не как предатель".

languages.text: {n}Jae looks at you.{/n} "Whatever they did to him, shereen, there is no way back for him now... If it were up to me, I would let him slip back into the illusion, where there is still hope of finding Tacitus. Let him go at peace with himself, and not as a traitor."
languages.original_text: {n}Джай бросает на вас взгляд.{/n} "Что бы с ним ни сделали, шерин, назад ему путь заказан... моя бы воля — позволила бы ему соскользнуть в ту реальность, где еще есть надежда найти Тацита. Пускай уйдет в мире с собой, а не как предатель".

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae looks at you.{/n} "Whatever they did to him, shereen, there is no way back for him now... If it were up to me, I would let him slip back into the illusion, where there is still hope of finding Tacitus. Let him go at peace with himself, and not as a traitor."

{n}Jae looks at you.{/n} "Whatever they did to him, shereen, there is no way back for him now... If it were up to me, I would let him slip back into the illusion, where there is still hope of finding Tacitus. Let him go at peace with himself, and not as a traitor."

{n}Jae looks at you.{/n} "Whatever they did to him, shereen, there is no way back for him now... If it were up to me, I would let him slip back into the illusion, where there is still hope of finding Tacitus. Let him go at peace with himself, and not as a traitor."

languages.text: {n}ジェイがこちらを見た。{/n}「シャリーン、奴らが彼に何をしたにせよ、もう彼は元に戻れないわ…あたしだったらタキタスが見つかる望みが残る幻覚の中へ戻してあげるわね。裏切り者としてではなく、自我を保ったまま平穏に逝かせましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Jae looks at you.{/n} "Whatever they did to him, shereen, there is no way back for him now... If it were up to me, I would let him slip back into the illusion, where there is still hope of finding Tacitus. Let him go at peace with himself, and not as a traitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイがこちらを見た。{/n}「奴らが彼に何をしたにせよ、もう彼は元に戻れないわ…私だったらタキタスが見つかる望みが残る幻覚の中へ戻してあげるわね。裏切り者としてではなく、自我を保ったまま平穏に逝かせましょう」

languages.text: {n}婕伊看向你。{/n}“虽然不知道异形对他做了什么，但他已经无药可救了，亲爱的……如果由我来决定，我会让他回到幻觉之中。至少在那里，他还有希望找回塔西佗。让他静静地离开吧，别把他当成叛徒。”
languages.original_text: {n}Jae looks at you.{/n} "Whatever they did to him, shereen, there is no way back for him now... If it were up to me, I would let him slip back into the illusion, where there is still hope of finding Tacitus. Let him go at peace with himself, and not as a traitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊看向你。{/n}“虽然不知道异形对他做了什么，但他已经无药可救了，亲爱的……如果由我来决定，我会让他回到幻觉之中。至少在那里，他还有希望找回塔西佗。让他静静地离开吧，别把他当成叛徒。”

languages.text: {n}Jae te mira.{/n} «Shereen, no sé qué le han hecho pero es irreversible... Si de mí dependiera, dejaría que se sumiera en la ilusión, donde aún le quedan esperanzas de encontrar a Tacitus. Que muera en paz, y no como un traidor».
languages.original_text: {n}Jae looks at you.{/n} "Whatever they did to him, shereen, there is no way back for him now... If it were up to me, I would let him slip back into the illusion, where there is still hope of finding Tacitus. Let him go at peace with himself, and not as a traitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae te mira.{/n} «Shereen, no sé qué le han hecho pero es irreversible... Si de mí dependiera, dejaría que se sumiera en la ilusión, donde aún le quedan esperanzas de encontrar a Tacitus. Que muera en paz, y no como un traidor».

languages.text: {n}Jae pose les yeux sur vous.{/n} « Je ne sais pas ce qu'ils lui ont fait, shereen, mais on ne peut plus rien pour lui... Si ça ne tenait qu'à moi, je le laisserais retomber dans son illusion, où il a toujours l'espoir de retrouver son fils. Laissez-le partir en paix avec lui-même, plutôt qu'en traître. »
languages.original_text: {n}Jae looks at you.{/n} "Whatever they did to him, shereen, there is no way back for him now... If it were up to me, I would let him slip back into the illusion, where there is still hope of finding Tacitus. Let him go at peace with himself, and not as a traitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae pose les yeux sur vous.{/n} « Je ne sais pas ce qu'ils lui ont fait, shereen, mais on ne peut plus rien pour lui... Si ça ne tenait qu'à moi, je le laisserais retomber dans son illusion, où il a toujours l'espoir de retrouver son fils. Laissez-le partir en paix avec lui-même, plutôt qu'en traître. »

languages.text: {n}Jae blickt dich an.{/n} "Was immer sie mit ihm gemacht haben, Shereen, es gibt für ihn kein Zurück mehr ... Ich würde ihn in die Illusion zurückgleiten lassen, wo noch Hoffnung besteht, Tacitus zu finden. Lasst ihn in Frieden mit sich selbst gehen, nicht als Verräter."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae looks at you.{/n} "Whatever they did to him, shereen, there is no way back for him now... If it were up to me, I would let him slip back into the illusion, where there is still hope of finding Tacitus. Let him go at peace with himself, and not as a traitor."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae blickt dich an.{/n} "Was immer sie mit ihm gemacht haben, Shereen, es gibt für ihn kein Zurück mehr ... Ich würde ihn in die Illusion zurückgleiten lassen, wo noch Hoffnung besteht, Tacitus zu finden. Lasst ihn in Frieden mit sich selbst gehen, nicht als Verräter."

languages.text: {n}Jae sana bakıyor.{/n} "Şirinim, ona her ne yaptılarsa artık geri dönüşü yok. Yerinde olsam onun illüzyona, hâlâ Tacitus'u bulma umudu bulunan o yere geri gönderirdim. Hain olarak değil de kendiyle barışık bir hâlde ölsün."
languages.original_text: {n}Jae looks at you.{/n} "Whatever they did to him, shereen, there is no way back for him now... If it were up to me, I would let him slip back into the illusion, where there is still hope of finding Tacitus. Let him go at peace with himself, and not as a traitor."
